amendment.description: In the nature of a substitute.

action.text: Amendment SA 3391 proposed by Senator Coats to Amendment SA 3395.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3391, under the order of 12/27/12, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, the amendment was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 54. Record Vote Number: 247.
